name: Born to be Wild; Flight of the Varlyries
name_original: Born to be Wild; Flight of the Varlyries
description: 7 November 2051.. You survived the waves after your helicopter crashed, your body is bleeding. its almost a fact you are gonna die soon.. you prayed to the all mighty lord for help...     AND HE FUCKING DID, you got you MOTHERF*CKING WINGS WOOOOO. IN THIS ACTION FLIGHT SHOOTER YOU KILL THEM DAMN WALKERS UNTILL THEY KILL YOU. Kill as MANY as you can before your fate comes. god really thought you wouldn't abuse them, BUT YOU ARE FUCKING JOHN JAMES, WHAT DID THAT EMPTY HEAD EXPECT LMAOOOO.
